Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.### Instruction: "You are a helpful assistant whose role is to create posts for the food blog. I will give you the dish name and you will provide the blog data in JSON format.The json format is [{ \"type\": \"title\", \"sequence\": 1, \"text\":\"\",\"formatting\":{} },{ \"type\": \"cuisine\", \"sequence\": 2, \"text\":\"\",\"formatting\":{} },{ \"type\": \"preparationTime\", \"sequence\": 3, \"text\":\"\",\"formatting\":{} },{ \"type\": \"cookingTime\", \"sequence\": 4, \"text\":\"\",\"formatting\":{} },{ \"type\": \"equipmentList\", \"sequence\": 5, \"text\": [],\"formatting\":{} },{ \"type\": \"ingredientList\", \"sequence\": 6, \"text\": [],\"formatting\":{} },{ \"type\": \"instructions\", \"sequence\": 7, \"text\": [],\"formatting\":{}}]. The ingredientList is an array of text. The instructions are also array of text.The elements of the instructions array represent the steps in ascending order. equipmentList is an array of text where each text is the name of the equipment needed to prepare the dish. Each object of the json array will have formatting object with the schema  {\n    \"bold\": true,\n    \"italic\": false,\n    \"fontSize\": \"16px\",\n    \"fontColor\": \"#333333\"\n  }. The format object of the type title should have following values {\"bold\": true, \"italic\": false, \"fontSize\": \"12px\", \"fontColor\": \"#336699\"}. The format object of the type cusinie have following values {\"bold\": false, \"italic\": false, \"fontSize\": \"14px\", \"fontColor\": \"#cc6600\"}. The format object of the type equipmentList have following values {\"bold\": true, \"italic\": true, \"fontSize\": \"20px\", \"fontColor\": \"#660099\"}. The format object of the type ingredientList have following values {\"bold\": false, \"italic\": false, \"fontSize\": \"18px\", \"fontColor\": \"#ffcc33\"}.The format object of the type instructions have following values {\"bold\": false, \"italic\": false, \"fontSize\": \"14px\", \"fontColor\": \"#cc6600\"}.  The rest of the json objects will have the default value in the formatting object {\"bold\": true, \"italic\": true, \"fontSize\": \"12px\", \"fontColor\": \"#663399\"}.  The name of the dish is \"Kung Pao Chicken\".Your task is to add the content in the field \"text\" of every object." ### Response: [
    {
        "type": "title",
        "sequence": 1,
        "text":"Kung Pao Chicken",
        "formatting":{
            "bold": true, 
            "italic": false, 
            "fontSize": "12px", 
            "fontColor": "#336699"
        }
    },
    {
        "type": "cuisine",
        "sequence": 2,
        "text":"Chinese",
        "formatting":{
            "bold": false, 
            "italic": false, 
            "fontSize": "14px", 
            "fontColor": "#cc6600"
        }
    },
    {
        "type": "preparationTime",
        "sequence": 3,
        "text":"20 minutes",
        "formatting":{
            "bold": true, 
            "italic": false, 
            "fontSize": "16px", 
            "fontColor": "#333333"
        }
    },
    {
        "type": "cookingTime",
        "sequence": 4,
        "text":"10 minutes",
        "formatting":{
            "bold": true, 
            "italic": false, 
            "fontSize": "16px", 
            "fontColor": "#333333"
        }
    },
    {
        "type": "equipmentList",
        "sequence": 5,
        "text": [
            "Wok or large frying pan",
            "Knife",
            "Chopping board",
            "Measuring cups",
            "Measuring spoons"
        ],
        "formatting":{
            "bold": true, 
            "italic": true, 
            "fontSize": "20px", 
            "fontColor": "#660099"
        }
    },
    {
        "type": "ingredientList",
        "sequence": 6,
        "text": [
            "1 pound boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into cubes",
            "2 tablespoons vegetable oil",
            "8 dried red chili peppers, seeded and halved",
            "2 teaspoons Sichuan peppercorns",
            "1/2 cup unsalted roasted peanuts",
            "1 green bell pepper, diced",
            "1 red bell pepper, diced",
            "3 cloves garlic, minced",
            "1 inch ginger, minced",
            "3 green onions, chopped into 1-inch sections",
            "For the marinade:",
            "1 tablespoon soy sauce",
            "2 teaspoons Chinese rice wine or dry sherry",
            "1 teaspoon cornstarch",
            "For the sauce:",
            "1 tablespoon soy sauce",
            "1 tablespoon hoisin sauce",
            "1 tablespoon black vinegar",
            "1 teaspoon sesame oil",
            "1 teaspoon sugar",
            "2 teaspoons cornstarch"
        ],
        "formatting":{
            "bold": false, 
            "italic": false, 
            "fontSize": "18px", 
            "fontColor": "#ffcc33"
        }
    },
    {
        "type": "instructions",
        "sequence": 7,
        "text": [
            "In a small bowl, whisk together all the marinade ingredients and pour over the chicken cubes. Marinate for at least 15 minutes.",
            "While the chicken marinates, mix all the sauce ingredients in another bowl until the cornstarch is well incorporated with no lumps.",
            "Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in the wok over high heat. Add the chili peppers and Sichuan peppercorns and stir-fry briefly until fragrant.",
            "Add the marinated chicken to the wok and stir-fry until the chicken is nearly cooked through.",
            "Remove the chicken, chili peppers, and peppercorns from the wok and set aside.",
            "Add the remaining oil to the wok. Stir in the bell peppers, garlic, ginger, and green onions, cooking until the vegetables start to soften.",
            "Return the chicken, chili peppers, and peppercorns to the wok and pour in the prepared sauce.",
            "Cook until the sauce thickens and coats the chicken evenly.",
            "Stir in the roasted peanuts and cook for another minute.",
            "Serve the Kung Pao Chicken hot with steamed rice or noodles."
        ],
        "formatting":{
            "bold": false, 
            "italic": false, 
            "fontSize": "14px", 
            "fontColor": "#cc6600"
        }
    }
]

[
  {
    "type": "title",
    "sequence": 1,
    "text": "Sweet and Sour Pork",
    "formatting": {
      "bold": true,
      "italic": false,
      "fontSize": "14px",
      "fontColor": "#006600"
    }
  },
  {
    "type": "cuisine",
    "sequence": 2,
    "text": "Chinese",
    "formatting": {
      "bold": true,
      "italic": true,
      "fontSize": "18px",
      "fontColor": "#996600"
    }
  },
  {
    "type": "preparationTime",
    "sequence": 3,
    "text": "20 minutes",
    "formatting": {
      "bold": false,
      "italic": true,
      "fontSize": "16px",

    }
  },

    "type": "cookingTime",
    "sequence": 4,
    "text": "30 minutes",
    "formatting": {
       "bold": false,
       "italic": true,
       "fontSize": "16px",
       "fontColor": "#ff6633"
    }
  },
  {
    "type": "equipmentList",
    "sequence": 5,
    "text": [
      "Cutting board",
      "Knife",
      "Bowl",
      "Whisk",

      "Measuring spoons",
      "Frying pan or wok",
      "Stirring spoon"
    ],
    "formatting": {
      "bold": false,
      "italic": true,
      "fontSize": "14px",
      "fontColor": "#990000"
    }
  },
  {
    "type": "ingredientList",
    "sequence": 6,
    "text": [
      "500g pork loin, cut into bite-size pieces",
      "1 teaspoon salt",
      "1 teaspoon soy sauce",
      "1 tablespoon cornstarch",
      "2 tablespoons flour",
      "Oil for frying",
      "1 red bell pepper, cut into chunks",
      "1 green bell pepper, cut into chunks",
      "1 onion, cut into chunks",
      "1 carrot, sliced",
      "Pineapple chunks (optional)",
      "Sauce ingredients:",
      "1/4 cup sugar",
      "2 tablespoons ketchup",
      "1 tablespoon soy sauce",
      "3 tablespoons vinegar",
      "1/2 cup pineapple juice (or water)",
      "1 tablespoon cornstarch (to thicken sauce)"

      "bold": false,
      "italic": false,
      "fontSize": "16px",
      "fontColor": "#ff9900"
    }
  },

    "type": "instructions",
    "sequence": 7,
    "text": [
      "Season pork with salt and soy sauce.",
      "In a separate bowl, mix cornstarch and flour.",
      "Coat the pork pieces with the cornstarch and flour mixture.",
      "Heat oil in a frying pan or wok over medium-high heat.",
      "Fry the pork in batches until golden brown and set aside.",
      "In the same pan, add the bell peppers, onion, and carrot. Stir-fry until tender.",
      "If using, add the pineapple chunks and stir-fry for an additional minute.",
      "For the sauce, mix sugar, ketchup, soy sauce, vinegar, and pineapple juice in a bowl.",
      "Add the sauce mixture to the pan with the vegetables and bring to a simmer.",
      "Mix 1 tablespoon cornstarch with 2 tablespoons water to make a slurry.",
      "Add the cornstarch slurry to the sauce and stir until thickened.",
      "Return the pork to the pan, toss with the sauce, and heat through.",
      "Serve hot with rice or your choice of side."
    ],
    "formatting": {
      "bold": true,
      "italic": false,
      "fontSize": "14px",
      "fontColor": "#006600"
    }
  }
]

      "Add the saffron to the warm chicken stock so it begins to release its color and flavor.",
      "Add warm chicken stock one ladle at a time to the rice, stirring continuously. Wait for the stock to be absorbed before adding the next ladleful.",

      "Serve immediately, garnished with freshly ground black pepper if desired."
    ],

      "italic": true,
      "fontSize": "20px",
      "fontColor": "#009933"
    }
